attacks.name: Rock Vengeance
attacks.effect: Does 20 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on all of your Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Rock Slide
attacks.effect: Does 20 damage to 2 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon (1 if there is only 1). (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
